description: Returns the base-64 encoded contents of a specified file and its metadata.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository that contains the file.

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: The fully qualified path to the file, including the full name and extension of the file. For example, /examples/file.md is the fully qualified path to a file named file.md in a folder named examples.

nested_items.name: commitId
nested_items.description: The full commit ID of the commit that contains the content returned by GetFile.

nested_items.name: blobId
nested_items.description: The blob ID of the object that represents the file content.

nested_items.name: filePath
nested_items.description: The fully qualified path to the specified file. Returns the name and extension of the file.

nested_items.name: fileMode
nested_items.description: The extrapolated file mode permissions of the blob. Valid values include strings such as EXECUTABLE and not numeric values.

nested_items.name: fileSize
nested_items.description: The size of the contents of the file, in bytes.

nested_items.name: fileContent
nested_items.description: The base-64 encoded binary data object that represents the content of the file.
